about.missionStatement: To connect talent with opportunity through AI-driven semantic matching that considers not just skills, but values, goals, and potential using next-generation vectorized technology.
about.storyTitle: Transforming How People Find Their Dream Jobs
about.storyDescription: Founded in 2020, Huntier was created to solve a fundamental problem: traditional job boards weren't matching people with opportunities that truly fit their skills, values, and potential.

problem.title: The Problem
problem.description: The job market was filled with inefficient keyword matching that missed context and nuance. Candidates struggled to find fitting roles, and companies missed out on ideal talent. Traditional hiring processes were outdated, biased, and lacked semantic understanding.

solution.title: Our Solution
solution.description: We built a next-generation AI platform using advanced vectorized matching and semantic search that understands the true meaning behind skills, experiences, and job requirements to create perfect connections between job seekers and employers.

impact.title: The Impact
impact.description: Today, Huntier has helped over 1 million people find jobs they love with a 94% satisfaction rate. Our AI-powered interviews and avatars have saved companies thousands of hours in recruitment, resulting in better matches and 35% higher retention rates.

about.avatarDescription: Our newest technology creates lifelike AI avatars that conduct initial screening interviews, allowing candidates to practice and prepare in a stress-free environment while helping employers identify the best matches efficiently.
about.valuesDescription: The principles that guide everything we do at Huntier.

empowering.title: Empowering Job Seekers
empowering.description: We believe in giving job seekers the tools and information they need to make confident career decisions.

accessible.title: Accessible to All
accessible.description: We're committed to making career opportunities accessible to everyone, regardless of background or experience.

innovative.title: Innovation-Driven
innovative.description: We continuously push the boundaries of what's possible in job matching through AI and technology.

community.title: Community-Focused
community.description: We build stronger career communities by connecting like-minded professionals and supporting knowledge sharing.

about.teamDescription: Meet the talented people behind Huntier.
about.joinUs: Join the Future of Job Matching
about.joinUsDescription: Huntier is growing rapidly, and we're always looking for talented individuals to join our mission.

impactful.title: Impactful Work
impactful.description: Your work directly helps people find fulfilling careers and companies build stronger teams.

culture.title: Innovation-First Culture
culture.description: We're at the cutting edge of AI and job-matching technology, constantly exploring new ideas.

growth.title: Growth Opportunities
growth.description: A fast-growing company means plenty of opportunities to develop your skills and advance your career.

remote.title: Remote-First
remote.description: Work from anywhere with flexible arrangements that prioritize your well-being and productivity.
